name-based-placeholder-refactor.initial_idea: Complete refactor to eliminate all index-based mappings and dual code paths in the Deckbuilder presentation system. Replace with ultra-DRY name-based system where PowerPoint template names are the single source of truth for both layouts and placeholders. This addresses current table processing issues caused by competing code paths and simplifies the entire system architecture.

slide-builder-refactor.initial_idea: Completely rip apart the 1,352-line slide_builder.py module and refactor it into smaller, focused modules. Remove redundant code like the massive field name variations mapping, eliminate duplication in content processing paths, and create a clean separation of concerns following SOLID principles.
